title: Pitcha this : Stories from the windy wanderers : Digital Storytelling workshop
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: Nine stories from the Indigenous community in Heywood in Victoria.
description: Nine stories from members of the Indigenous community in Heywood in south-western Victoria. The stories, while providing an insight into the treatment of Indigenous people in Australia, are mostly personal accounts of what it is that keeps these particular people spiritually connected, whether it be the land or the people they love.
